rules.ruleString: (Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {ATS1141} and  Incompatible with course version org unit in {50000561} with course status in {ENROLLED, INACTIVE, INTERMIT} and  Incompatible with course version in {0080, 0082, 0116, 0170, 0530, 0542, 0660, 0978, 0980, 1053, 1054, 1055, 1138, 1185, 1208, 1209, 1210, 1211, 1260, 1262, 1377, 1497, 1541, 1620, 1641, 1733, 1791, 1800, 1804, 1807, 1880, 1941, 1995, 1996, 1997, 1998, 2025, 2317, 3199, 3237, 3238, 3239, 3426} with course status in {ENROLLED, INACTIVE, INTERMIT})

proh: Students enrolled in Arts courses are prohibited from taking this unit. In addition, students taking this unit are excluded from taking ATS1141.
description: This unit aims to develop knowledge, strategies and skills to interact in Japanese in situations likely to be encountered in Australia and Japan and to establish a firm foundation of linguistic, sociolinguistic and sociocultural knowledge, which can be creatively applied in a variety of situations.
